name: John Brick - The Boogeyman
description:
ARE YOU FAST ENOUGH? 

John Brick is a game with a very simple and challenging mechanics, just be quick between shooting and protecting yourself

VERY HARD?

By killing enemies, you get enough money to buy upgrades that will make it a lot easier.

... OR VERY EASY?

The difficulty of the levels rises with the passage of the stages, with new mechanics. There will always be a new difficulty!

CURRENT PROGRESS

This is a demo version and has 3 levels, there is still a lot of work to be done. The project is being done with a "big" team of one person, so I'm counting on your feedback. Any suggestion / bug report will be of great help. NOTE: I'm Brazilian, so I'm using google translate, sorry for any translation errors.

If you liked it, help the project!
